Texts.Chs:
全宇宙都知道叶族是极具攻击性的食肉猎手。阳光仍然能部分维持他们的生命，在直射光下再生。缺少阳光会使它们慢慢地饿死。

  ^orange;食性^reset;：肉食性

^orange;天赋^reset;：
  HP x^green;1.15^reset;,
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^cyan;20^reset;% 精神抗性, 毒素抗性, +^cyan;15^reset;% 电系抗性
  日间会^green;回复生命^reset;。如果生命值&饱食度已满，则会增加^green;能量回复速度^reset;
免疫：^green;感电^reset;

^orange;环境^reset;：
  ^green;森林类^reset;生态： 能量 x^green;1.15^reset;
  ^red;荒芜、腐蚀和冰冻^reset;生物群落: 防御 x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;：

  弓系专精 +^green;20^reset;%
  矛系专精 +^green;15^reset;%，攻击有几率附带毒素。
  针刺/叶族武器/投掷武器: +^green;2^reset;% 暴击率

^red;弱点^reset;：
  ^red;在夜间^reset;: HP x^red;0.9^reset;, 能量x^red;0.8^reset;, 加快饥饿速率
  ^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% 火炎抗性, -^red;5^reset;% 暗影抗性
Texts.Eng:
Florans are known throughout the universe to be aggressive hunters. They still partially sustain themselves on sunlight, regenerating in direct light. Lack of sunlight slowly starves them.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;,
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;20^reset;% Mental, Poison, +^cyan;15^reset;% Electric
  ^green;Regenerate^reset; during day. If Health+Food are full, +^green;E. Regen^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  In ^green;forest-like^reset; biomes: Energy x^green;1.15^reset;
  In ^red;barren, corrosive and frozen^reset; biomes: Defense x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Bow Mastery +^green;20^reset;%
  Spear Mastery +^green;15^reset;%. Chance for Poison Strike.
  Needler/Floran Weapons/Thrown: +^green;2^reset;% Crit

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;At night^reset;: Health x^red;0.9^reset; and Energy x^red;0.8^reset;, increased Hunger drain
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Fire, -^red;5^reset;% Shadow
